Implements RtStreamingEndPoint.

void RtStreamingSource::Detach (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Implements RtStreamingEndPoint.

void RtStreamingSource::NotifyDataReady (   )  [protected]
 

Notifies data is available for streaming.

Must be called in response to StartAction().

virtual void RtStreamingSource::OnBufferSwitch (  RtStreamingBuffer &  buffer  )  [protected, pure virtual]
 

Indicates buffer switch.

Should be implemented as following:
Gain ownership of 'buffer' and refill it or queue it for asynchronous refilling in background. The assign a buffer containing data to 'buffer', giving ownership to the corresponding RtStreamingSink instance. The last buffer of the stream should have the IsEndOfData() flag set.

Implemented in DataSourceRtStreamingSource.

virtual BOOLEAN RtStreamingSource::StartAction (  const BufferInfo &  buf_info  )  [protected, pure virtual]
 

Implements the concrete Start() behaviour.

Implemented in DataSourceRtStreamingSource.

virtual BOOLEAN RtStreamingSource::StopAction (   )  [protected, pure virtual]
 

Implements the concrete Stop() behaviour.

When this method is invoked the implementation should stop producing data and set the end-of-data flag for the next buffer delivered within the call to OnBufferSwitch().

Implemented in DataSourceRtStreamingSource.
